ComicInfo.Penciller: John Severin,Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Vic Martin,Bob Taylor,Don Orehek
ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin,Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Vic Martin,Bob Taylor,Don Orehek

ComicInfo.Title: The Johnny Dick Griffson Show; Fake Swimming Pool; Cracked Looks at Department Stores; Did You Ever Have One of Those Days?; Cracked Interviews the Hamburger King; You Know You're Not a Kid Anymore When...; The Cracked Supermarket Primer; Nixon's Next Job; The War on Law; Telephone Madness; Will-Odd
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hudd and Dini escape prison but when they try to dive into a nearby swimming pool they find the water is only a tarp and the guard is waiting by the empty pool.
Having left politics, Nixon tries his hand at television repair, weather reports, air traffic control, sanitation, eyeglasses, chimney sweeping, commercials and plumbing.
